questions.name: help
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to help you with daily chores if you were sick?

questions.name: emotional_support
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to turn to for suggestions about how to deal with a personal problem?

questions.name: enjoyable
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to do something enjoyable with?

questions.name: loved
questions.display_question: How often do you have someone to love and make you feel wanted?

questions.name: interfere
questions.display_question: During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities (like visiting friends or relatives)?

questions.name: social_activity
questions.display_question: Compared to your usual level of social activity, has your social activity during the past 6 months changed because of a change in your physical or emotional condition?

questions.name: social_comparison
questions.display_question: Compared to others your age, are your social activities more or less limited because of your physical health or emotional problems?

questions.name: weight_yes_no
questions.display_question: In the past 6 months, has your weight changed?

questions.name: weight_loss
questions.display_question: How much weight have you lost?

questions.name: weight_gain
questions.display_question: How much weight have you gained?

questions.name: satisfication
questions.display_question: Are you basically satisfied with your life?

questions.name: dropped_activities
questions.display_question: Have you dropped many of your activities and interests?

questions.name: happy
questions.display_question: Do you feel happy most of the time?

questions.name: prefer_staying_home
questions.display_question: Do you prefer to stay at home, rather than going out and doing new things?

questions.name: has_medications
questions.display_question: Are you taking any prescribed medications?

questions.name: num_medications
questions.display_question: Approximately how many different prescribed medications do you take each day?

questions.name: supplements
questions.display_question: Are you taking any supplements, including herbals and vitamins?

questions.name: num_supplements
questions.display_question: Approximately how many herbs, vitamins and supplements do you take each day?

questions.name: martial_status
questions.display_question: What is your current marital status?

questions.name: living_situation
questions.display_question: What is your current living situation?
answer_choices: Living with someone else (not family or partner)

questions.name: education
questions.display_question: What is your highest level of education?

questions.name: smoked_30
questions.display_question: In the past 30 days, have you smoked cigarettes (even a single puff) or used other tobacco products?

questions.name: smoke_consider_quitting
questions.display_question: Are you willing to consider quittying?

questions.name: alcohol
questions.display_question: Do you drink alcohol?

questions.name: alcohol_cut_down
questions.display_question: Have you ever felt you should cut down?

questions.name: alcohol_annoyed
questions.display_question: Have people annoyed you by talking to you about your drinking or drug use?

questions.name: alcohol_guilty
questions.display_question: Have you felt bad or guilty about your drinking or drug use?

questions.name: alcohol_morning
questions.display_question: Have you had a drink or used drugs first thing in the morning to calm your nerves or to get rid of a hangover?

questions.name: alcohol_per_day
questions.display_question: Do you have more than 4 drinks per day?

questions.name: home_health
questions.display_question: Do you have home care services now (such as a visiting nurse or home health aid)?

questions.name: assessment_taker
questions.display_question: Who completed this assessment?

current_question.name: social_comparison
current_question.display_question: Compared to others your age, are your social activities more or less limited because of your physical health or emotional problems?

conversation: Hello
Welcome to your health care questionnaire. Are you ready to start with the first question?
I am ready
Great! Let's start with the first question. How much has your bathing been limited by your health condition? The answer choices are: not limited, limited a little, or limited a lot. (id: 1)
limited a little
I see, thank you for sharing that. Now, could you tell me how much your dressing has been limited by your health condition? (id: 2)
limited a little
Understood. Now, could you tell me how much your grooming has been limited by your health condition? (id: 3)
limited a little
Alright, I've noted that down. Moving on, how much has your feeding been limited by your health condition? (id: 4)
limited a little
I see. Now, could you tell me how much your walking inside the home has been limited by your health condition? (id: 5)
limited a little
Okay, got it. And how about walking outside the home? Has your health condition limited that in any way? (id: 6)
limited a lot
I understand. Now, could you tell me how much your bladder and bowel control has been limited by your health condition? (id: 7)
limited a little
Alright, I've noted that down. Moving on, how independently are you able to use the telephone? Would you say you can do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 8)
with some help
I see. And how about doing your laundry? Can you do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 9)
with some help
Got it. Now, how independently can you go shopping? Are you able to do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 10)
unable to do so
I understand. Let's talk about meal preparation. How independently can you prepare meals? Would you say you can do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 11)
with some help
Alright, I've noted that down. Now, how about housework? Can you do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 12)
with some help
I see. Now, how independently can you handle your own medication? Are you able to do it without help, with some help, or are you unable to do so? (id: 13)
unable to do so
I understand. It's important to have support for that. Now, have you ever fallen, like losing your balance, tripping, or dropping to the ground without control? (id: 14)
no
That's good to hear. Now, how would you describe your vision? Would you say it's excellent, good, fair, or poor? (id: 17)
poor
I see, thank you for sharing that. How about your hearing? Would you describe it as excellent, good, fair, or poor? (id: 18)
good
That's good to hear. Now, do you use a cane for assistance? (id: 19)
yes
I see, thank you for letting me know. Do you also use a walker? (id: 20)
no
Alright, thank you for letting me know. Do you use crutches? (id: 21)
no
Alright, thank you for sharing. Do you use a wheelchair? (id: 22)
no
I see, thank you for letting me know. Do you use a brace? (id: 23)
no
Okay, got it. Do you use a prosthesis? (id: 24)
no
Alright, thank you for letting me know. Do you use a hearing aid? (id: 25)
no
Alright, thank you for sharing. Do you wear glasses? (id: 26)
no
Alright, thank you for letting me know. Now, if you were sick, how often do you have someone to help you with daily chores? (id: 27)
most of the time
That's good to hear. Now, how often do you have someone to turn to for suggestions about how to deal with a personal problem? (id: 28)
most of the time
Great, it's important to have someone to rely on. How about having someone to do something enjoyable with? How often does that happen? (id: 29)
not at all
I see, thank you for sharing that with me. Now, how often do you have someone to love and make you feel wanted? (id: 30)
not at all

I'm sorry to hear that. During the past 4 weeks, how much of the time has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your social activities like visiting friends or relatives? (id: 31)
not at all

That's good to hear. Now, compared to your usual level of social activity, has your social activity during the past 6 months changed because of a change in your physical or emotional condition? The answer choices are much less, somewhat less, same, somewhat more, much more. (id: 32)
somewhat more

I see, you've been somewhat more socially active. Now, compared to others your age, are your social activities more or less limited because of your physical health or emotional problems? The answer choices are much less, somewhat less, same, somewhat more, much more. (id: 33)
